title.en: Essence and Embodiment of All the Buddhas1

text.en: Essence and embodiment of all the buddhas of the past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum sangye tamché düpé ngowo

text.en: Lord whose presence pervades the oceanic maṇḍalas and buddha families, precious root guru of incomparable kindness, watch over me!
text.en-trans: rik dang kyilkhor gyatsö khyabdak kadrin tsungmé tsawé lama rinpoche khyen

text.en: Let your blessings infuse my mind, I pray.
text.en-trans: dak gi gyü jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Bless me, I pray, that I may recognize my dreams as dreams.
text.en-trans: milam milam du shepar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Bless me, I pray, that I may be able to create emanations within dreams and transform them.
text.en-trans: milam trul gyur nüpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Bless me, I pray, that my dreams may arise as clear light.
text.en-trans: milam ösal du charwar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: Bless me, I pray, that I may continuously integrate luminosity!
text.en-trans: ösal khoryuk tu drepar jingyi lab tu sol
